about_the_game:
Race for the fastest time in this difficult time attack racing game,
the demo contains 3 out of 11 tracks, and 2 out of 3 and local multiplayer.
detailed_description:
Race for the fastest time in this difficult time attack racing game,
the demo contains 3 out of 11 tracks, and 2 out of 3 and local multiplayer.
name: Hovercraft Racing Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

short_description: Race for the fastest time in this difficult time attack racing game, the demo contains 3 out of 11 tracks, and 2 out of 3 and local multiplayer.
